attributes.action: please change the law for 16 year olds who were able to purchase tobacco before the age went up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i myself am a sixteen year old and I am outraged that the fact that when I turned sixteen i could purchase tobacco but a month or two later you put the age up to eighteen. I propose that people in the same situation as me should still be able to purchase tobacco products if they turned sixteen before the law was changed, but others who turned sixteen after the new law should have to be eighteen to purchase tobacco.
